summary: When his daughter goes missing from their prairie town east of France, Alain and his young son, Kid, head out to find her. The journey takes the men to some far-off and unsettling places in what begins to feel like an endless quest.
cast: François Damiens|Finnegan Oldfield|Agathe Dronne|Ellora Torchia|Antoine Chappey|Maxim Driesen|Jean-Louis Coulloc'h|Gilles Treton|Francis Leplay|Djemel Barek|Mounir Margoum|Leïla Saadali|Laure Calamy|Antoine Régent|Iliana Zabeth|Antonia Campbell-Hughes|John C. Reilly|Sam Louwyck|Rami Farah|Noémie Desestret|Sophia Lanz|Tariq Bettahar|Bertrand Constant|Serge Onteniente|Laure Darie|Bruno Munda|Lyes Kaouah|Muthana Alhussin|Amaryllis Uitterlinden|Robbie Cleiren|Caroline Attal|Sanjay Dadich|Hillbilly Rockers|Antoine Laurent|Tauqueer Alam Khan|Sadh Orhan|Vikas Shukla|Habib Azmi|Dani Sanchez-Lopez|Adil Nabi|Tauqeer Alam Khan
keywords: france|muslim convert|missing person|father son relationship|car crash
title: Mi hija, mi hermana
